item.title: Routing
item.description: Domain knowledge of your data can lead to better performance with a custom routing solution. Routing is the process by which ElasticSearch determines which shard a document will reside in. Monstache supports user defined, or custom, routing of your MongoDB documents into ElasticSearch. Consider an example where you have a comments collection in MongoDB which stores a comment and its associated post identifier. use blog; db.comments.insert({title: "Did you read this?", post_id: "123"}); db.
